channel.title: Only Crowbar, Pistol & Magnum
channel.description: I'm right at the start of Surface Tension & for some reason I'm no longer able to select any weapon other than the Crowbar, Pistol & Magnum. There are others in the inventory, but I can't even scroll to them.

item.title: Only Crowbar, Pistol & Magnum
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
I’m right at the start of Surface Tension & for some reason I’m no longer able to select any weapon other than the Crowbar, Pistol & Magnum. There are others in the inventory, but I can’t even scroll to them.

Read full topic
